levels.description: Recover <@ba.vup>1</> SP every second for every neighboring allied unit; Neighboring allied units have <@ba.vup>50%</> reduced DEF and become more likely to be attacked by enemies; Consumes <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP to deal <@ba.vup>5000</> True damage to enemies in the <@ba.vup>Lower Level Test Area</> and <$ba.stun>Stun</> them for <@ba.vup>7</> seconds
